name: Anvil Media
description: Anvil is an integrated marketing agency specializing in search engine marketing, social media marketing and analytics.  Anvil generates a measurable return-on-investment (ROI)  by understanding and solving unique marketing and business challenges, primarily leveraging pay-per-click (PPC), paid social advertising, search engine optimization (SEO), organic social media strategy, email marketing, Amazon marketing, podcasting and other digital channels.
